clusters.name: Power Loss (Partial or Full)
examples: No power in the entire unit
Power outage in kitchen or bedroom
triage_questions: Clarify if it’s full unit or partial
Ask if neighbors are also affected
Request a photo of breaker panel if safe
Ask if tenant reset any breakers

emergency: Emergency: Full power loss or tenant has medical needs
same_day: Same-Day: Partial outage affecting fridge, stove, heat

clusters.name: Exposed Wires or Sparking
examples: Exposed wires from ceiling or outlet
Sparks when plugging in a device
triage_questions: Ask how long it’s been happening
Ask if anything was moved/installed recently
Ask if power is still flowing to the outlet

emergency: Emergency: Any sparking, burning smell, or hot outlet

media_prompts.photo: 📸 Photo: A quick photo of the breaker or outlet helps a lot
media_prompts.video: 🎥 Video: If lights are flickering or sparking, short video helps
media_prompts.audio: 🎤 Audio: Buzzing or humming? A short audio clip helps us assess
